text: William Henry Kirk (11 October 1912–1991) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1991 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Grantham Town F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:West Ham United F.C. players Category:Yeovil Town F.C. players Category:Worcester City F.C. players
title: William Kirk (footballer)
